data.title: Highly recommended
data.text: We all had a ball and will definitely be back!!!  We had two 11 year olds and a 17 year old and it kept all of them engaged.

data.title: Fun for the whole family
data.text: Originally, my husband and I were planning on coming here as part of our date weekend. However, due to Hurricane Matthew, my parents could not watch my 9 year old, so I called to leave a message about rescheduling. Vinnie, the owner called me and told me to bring my son, no problem. That was so great of him. This was our first escape experience and we did the Da Vinci Office escape room. It was so fun and challenging. We did need to call on the walkie talkie a few times for hints, lol. We can't wait to come back when in the area again and try a new challenge. The staff is friendly and professional.

data.title: Exciting and challenging fun!
data.text:
This was our first escape room experience and it was fantastic! The owner/manager, Vinnie (sp?) was super helpful and easy going, with a great attitude. He explained things very well and offered only as much help as we wanted for our first attempt. The room we played in was very interesting and the puzzles had a nice range of difficulty, but were not un-figure-out-able. 

You get flashlights (it's pretty dark in the room), a white board for writing notes on, a bin to place personal belongings, and a 2-way radio so the manager can be in contact with you or if you want/need anything. (The door to the outside is not actually locked in this scenario, not sure if others are.) There's a timer in the room to track your progress by. You can ask for hints over the radio if you get really stuck, but it's up to you if you want help or not. 

Overall, a super fun way to spend an hour. I would think it would be awesome for a fun team-building exercise, or any size group (they accommodate up to 8 per room, per slot.) Check out their website to schedule your slot and number of people. 

At the end you get a fun pic with your time and the room you accomplished, (if you get through!) Highly recommended for an exciting, challenging time!

data.title: Great Experience
data.text:
My work colleagues held a team building event here.  The group of 7 of us took on the "Area 51" room. None of us had ever been to an Escape Room before, but the staff was very friendly and helped us all understand the concept.  

We were all offered a complimentary beverage and shown a video to introduce us to the room.  We were then taken in to the room and set off to solve the mission.  The staff only offered a few helpful hints to get us back on track when we got stuck.  

Our team had a really great time and had lots of fun.  I would recommend this to both professionals looking for team building or for personal pleasure.

data.title: Great Experience!
data.text: Let me just start by saying I almost wrecked the car when I saw an escape room coming to concord. My fiancé and I are avid fans of escape rooms, and Escape Artist did not disappoint! We have completed the hangover room and Area 51. Both rooms with awesome loads of puzzles and some that are very unique! I would highly recommend this place of business!

data.title: Great first Escape Room experience
data.text: This was my first Escape Room experience and it was awesome and will definitely not be the last. Went with my daughter who had been to several others in Europe and she said this one was the most challenging one she had experienced. We did Area 51 and it was a great time. I would suggest that you bring more than 2 people for this particular room.  Vincent was extremely accommodating and explained thoroughly what we would encounter once we entered the room. A lot of planning has gone into this experience and it shows.

data.title: If you like puzzles and a challenge - you'll love this!
data.text: This is so much fun! The staff is accommodating, professional, and eager to make your experience a good one. We had a great time trying to crack "Da Vinci's Office" room with my in-laws who were visiting. This room is challenging, but it's fun to work together.

data.title: Had a blast!
data.text: Had a blast with friends in Area 51!  Can't wait to go back and do The Hangover room.  I highly recommend if you are looking for a fun night out with friends or family!

data.title: Awesome time!!
data.text: Room was excellent, Customer Service is top notch, Friendly staff, Professional in every way they can be. We will be back!!!

data.title: Something fun and different
data.text:
Escape Artist is in a great location on Union Street  
It is very well run and a great experience for the whole family.
Had a great time and will be back
